sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Rename Experience Type to UI Layout in sys_pd_activity_definition</description>
        <name>Rename Experience Type in activity def</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
gr.addQuery('name', 'sys_pd_activity_definition');
gr.addQuery('internal_type', 'reference');
gr.addQuery('element', 'activity_type');
gr.query();
if (gr.next()) {
	gr.setValue('column_label', 'UI Layout');
	gr.update();
}
gr = new GlideRecord('sys_documentation');
gr.addQuery('name', 'sys_pd_activity_definition');
gr.addQuery('element', 'activity_type');
gr.query();
if (gr.next()) {
	gr.setValue('label', 'UI Layout');
	gr.setValue('plural', 'UI Layouts');
	gr.update();
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-12-07 19:47:12</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>ca009fb24f231110ac8b5201b1ce0b14</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Rename Experience Type in activity def</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Process Automation Designer Core - Model" source="com.glide.pad.core.model">0ae817db47220210cd4e1ce4316d431f</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_ca009fb24f231110ac8b5201b1ce0b14</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-12-07 19:56:52</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Rename Experience Type in activity def
